meanings.definition: The state or quality of being monospecific.
meanings.sent1: The monospecificity of the flower species made it easy to identify.
meanings.sent2: Scientists studied the monospecificity of the protein to understand its function.
meanings.sent3: The monospecificity of the cookie jar caused a hilarious mix-up at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her monospecificity in choosing colors for her paintings reflected her unique style.
meanings.sent5: The monospecificity of the fingerprint left at the crime scene helped solve the case.

meanings.definition: The condition of having only one specific characteristic or feature.
meanings.sent1: The monospecificity of the car's engine made it stand out from the rest.
meanings.sent2: The monospecificity of the bird's call allowed birdwatchers to identify it easily.
meanings.sent3: The monospecificity of the dress code for the party led to some interesting outfit choices.
meanings.sent4: His monospecificity in taste made him a picky eater.
meanings.sent5: The monospecificity of the diamond's cut gave it a brilliant sparkle.
